resources.string: By keeping a routine of daily training you will have significant gains in muscle mass, and improve your reflexes and relieve the stresses of your day-to-day.

Your biggest opponent is yourself and your best ally will be your master. The fight, on Brazilian Jiu-jitsu, is like a chess match, then be the stronger or heavier is not always as relevant. The difference between the winner and the loser will be yourself.
You can always learn something new

Every new workout you realize that is evolving and getting better understand how the struggle and his own body. With time spend less energy and more technical, turning a fight in a real strategy game where who distract former can lose.
This martial art allows you to make new friendships that can be eternal. All work for the sake of your progress and you will work with a view to their evolution, regardless of range.
Unlike some martial arts, master of Brazilian Jiu Jitsu is more friend than a true master.
